positive.valid_data: when user input data api create HD using valid data, then user got response 200/ok

negative.AgeFalse: when user input data api create HD with value age = false, then user got response error
negative.JobFalse: when user input data api create HD  with value job = false, then user got response error
negative.MedicalFalse: when user input data api create HD  with value medical = false, then user got response error
